comment.body: Deleted mine like 2 years back. Best decision I've made concerning a social network. Fuck Zuckerberg
@Quantumworld: Actually there is a GIF site already on 0net - http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Gif7PqWTzVWDQ42Mo7np3zXmGAo3DXc7h/
@Quantumworld: Well shoot.. and here I was thinking I knew something LOL
KuCoin. I like their KCS shares. Anywhere I can earn a dividend is alright in my eyes.
@Styromaniac: So do you need a place that accepts debit/credit cards? I like the Cash App for onboarding from USD to BTC.

@Styromaniac: Well I think Cash App is a Square product, but I have been using that to onboard smaller amounts of USD to BTC. Uphold has a minimum of $50 deposit. I like Uphold, but sometimes I only want to drop $5-$10 to get some BTC. Cash App is good for this.
@Styromaniac: You connect your bank account or debit card and then load your Cash App account with USD. You then buy BTC in the app with that and then you can withdraw to an external BTC wallet

@ulrichard: They only siphon money from your account if you give them permission. The app is a reputable app and can be trusted. I've used it for quite a while and have never came up missing money. As a matter of fact Bisq exchange uses Cash App as one of their top up options.
@Nofish: Can't wait for that release. :) Thank you
